CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Copper
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Copper
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Copper is a soft, reddish metal prized for its conductivity and malleability. It has been a staple in crafting and electrical applications across civilizations for centuries.
